task.prompt: In polar coordinates, the point $\left( -2, \frac{3 \pi}{8} \right)$ is equivalent to what other point, in the standard polar coordinate representation?  Enter your answer in the form $(r,\theta),$ where $r > 0$ and $0 \le \theta < 2 \pi.$
